section.heading: Transitional provision.
section.text: A motion or other request for relief made in a child-custody proceeding or to enforce a child-custody determination which was commenced before April 27, 2001, is governed by the law in effect at the time the motion or other request was made.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 17-378 redesignated this section and substituted “April 27, 2001” for “the effective date of this chapter”.
The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-171 made a stylistic change.
Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 402 of the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (1997 Act).
